title: Annunciation Impossible Requests 9 Month Novena
description: Have an impossible request? Pray this 9-month novena now. Walk with Mary from Annunciation to Christmas and experience the miraculous power that brought forth Christ.

days.prayer:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Hail, Holy Queen, Mother of Mercy, our life, our sweetness, and our hope! To thee do we cry, poor banished children of Eve, to thee do we send up our sighs, mourning and weeping in this valley of tears. Turn then, most gracious advocate, thine eyes of mercy toward us, and after this, our exile, show unto us the blessed fruit of thy womb Jesus. O clement, O loving, O sweet Virgin Mary. V â€“ Pray for us, most holy Mother of God. R â€“ That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ. Amen. Virgin of the Incarnation, a thousand times we greet thee, a thousand times we praise thee for thy joy when God was incarnated in thee. Because thou art so powerful a Virgin and Mother of God, grant what we ask of thee for the love of God. (Write into this box your three requests, then pray for the FIRST request at this point in the novena.) (mention request hereâ€¦) Hail, Holy Queen, Mother of Mercy, our life, our sweetness, and our hope! To thee do we cry, poor banished children of Eve, to thee do we send up our sighs, mourning and weeping in this valley of tears. Turn then, most gracious advocate, thine eyes of mercy toward us, and after this, our exile, show unto us the blessed fruit of thy womb Jesus. O clement, O loving, O sweet Virgin Mary. V â€“ Pray for us, most holy Mother of God. R â€“ That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ. Amen. Virgin of the Incarnation, a thousand times we greet thee, a thousand times we praise thee for thy joy when God was incarnated in thee. Because thou art so powerful a Virgin and Mother of God, grant what we ask of thee for the love of God. (Pray for your SECOND request at this point in the novena prayer.) Hail, Holy Queen, Mother of Mercy, our life, our sweetness, and our hope! To thee do we cry, poor banished children of Eve, to thee do we send up our sighs, mourning and weeping in this valley of tears. Turn then, most gracious advocate, thine eyes of mercy toward us, and after this, our exile, show unto us the blessed fruit of thy womb Jesus. O clement, O loving, O sweet Virgin Mary. V â€“ Pray for us, most holy Mother of God. R â€“ That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ. Amen. Virgin of the Incarnation, a thousand times we greet thee, a thousand times we praise thee for thy joy when God was incarnated in thee. Because thou art so powerful a Virgin and Mother of God, grant what we ask of thee for the love of God. (Pray for your THIRD request at this point in the novena prayer.)

Remember, O most Gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who fled to thy protection, implored thy help or sought thy intercession was left unaided. Inspired by this confidence, I fly unto thee, O Virgin of Virgins, my mother. To thee do I come, before thee I stand, sinful and sorrowful. O Mother of the Word Incarnate, despise not my petitions, but in thy mercy hear and answer me. Amen. Hail Maryâ€¦ Blessed and praised be the Most Holy Sacrament of the Altar, in Heaven, on earth, and everywhere. Amen.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Answered Prayer From This Novena

Praise be to Jesus and the Virgin Mary,

I was praying the Virgin Marys novena everyday, it is such a beautiful first off and I truely feel that I have closer in my relationship to the Mother of God. She answered one of my prayers the same. I had prayed for her to soften the heart of a specific person who was not cooperating (she had every reason to). That same day that persons heart softened through the power of the Immaculate Heart of Mary, the person decided to help me.

from N.G.

I started the novena back in January of this year and have prayed it in anticipation for the Annunciation Novena.

Our adult daughter, who for many years has been away from the faith, on Ash Wednesday, sent us a text asking if there were such a thing as â€˜virtual ashesâ€™ she could receive since she couldnâ€™t make it to Mass.

From that point on, she has shared scripture verses via text messages and is now taking steps to return to the Eucharist. Indeed, how good is the LORD.

A M D Gâ€¦ For the greater glory of God.

from D.B.

I am writing to share a testimony of how the Annunciation Impossible Requests 9 Month Novena has already begun to bring about an answered prayer in my life.

Though I am still in the process of completing the novena, I am deeply grateful to share that my family and I have already received a significant answer to our prayers. For several months, we have been waiting for the approval of my work permit and my daughterâ€™s study permit. This situation had left us feeling anxious, as the outcome had a direct impact on our future plans.

In faith, I included these requests in my novena, and to our great joy, we have already received the approval for both my work permit and my daughterâ€™s study permit. In addition, my daughterâ€™s tuition fees have been reduced from international to domestic rates, a blessing that has lifted a tremendous financial burden from us.

I truly believe this is the hand of God at work, and I am so grateful for the intercession of Our Blessed Mother, who has guided us and helped us in this time of need. Even though I have not yet completed the full novena, I wanted to share this early answer to prayer as a testimony of Godâ€™s faithfulness and love.

I will continue to pray the novena and also want to thank you for this wonderful novena app. It has been a great blessing to many people, including myself, by serving as a guide in praying the novena. May God continue to bless you abundantly.

With heartfelt gratitude,

from M.C.

Our Lady of Guadalupe Novena

What is the 9 month novena for impossible requests?

In the Impossible Requests Novena, you list three difficult, seemingly hopeless, or otherwise impossible requests and pray for each one of them within the novena prayers each day.

We believe in faith that nothing is impossible to God and that Our Ladyâ€™s intercession is more powerful than anyone elseâ€™s, so we believe that, if it is Godâ€™s will for us, He will answer our prayers in this novena in the way that we hope.

If our prayers seem to be unanswered, we resign ourselves to Godâ€™s will and know that it is best for us that we did not receive the answer that we wanted. Godâ€™s ways are higher than our ways, and His thoughts are higher than our thoughts.

To accompany this novena, it is a good and pious practice to assist at Mass and go to Confession on the 25th of each month from March to December.
